title: Recycling hazardous and energy-demanding piezoelectric ceramics using an oxide–halide perovskite upside-down composite method
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,961-974
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00348E, Paper

Sivagnana Sundaram Anandakrishnan, Mohadeseh Tabeshfar, Mikko Nelo, Jani Peräntie, Heli Jantunen, Jari Juuti, Yang Bai
Both Pb-based and Pb-free piezoceramics find a new purpose as fillers in upside-down composites fabricated with an ultralow energy budget, providing a second life to sensors and energy harvesters.
